_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

The foolish, incompetent, unskillful men: Meditates by observing an aspect of the body
Meditates observing an aspect of feelings
Meditates observing an aspect of mind
Meditates observing an aspect of principles
The astute, competent, skillful mendican: Meditates by observing an aspect of the body
Meditates observing an aspect of feelings
Meditates observing an aspect of mind
Meditates observing an aspect of principles
